text: WVHL is a Country formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Farmville, Virginia, serving the Southside. WVHL is owned and operated by North Street Enterprise, Inc. Additionally, WVHL is the primary radio broadcaster for basketball, baseball, and softball for Longwood University. ==References== ==External links== * Kickin' Country 92.9 Online * VHL Category:Country radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1996
title: WVHL
